item.title: Brightxf
item.description: Brightxf â€ƒ!! Run at Own Risk !! No issues have come from my use of these but that doesn’t mean there won’t be These scripts are NOT fully dynamic yet(on TODO’s) and these values are hard-coded into brightxf: minimum brightness, if you don’t want the screen to ever fully go black or if any negative numbers can be written to that file and cause any problems the amount to increment up/down is not dynamic yet, will try to get it 5%-10% each time, sometime.
